name: 高級寫作（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】、【ENU0288  中級寫作（二）】、【ENU0289  高級寫作（一）】
description: 在「高級寫作」中，該課程旨在將學生在前兩年學到的寫作技巧，與他們對某個主題、學科或主題的知識相結合，以便為學生未來的職業生涯做好準備。本課程將使用不同類型、富有創意的文體，在不同領域進行情境化的寫作，內容可能包括與考試相關、與工作相關、或與研究論文相關的主題。以文字為主的寫作，也可能搭配其他的傳播管道，例如圖片、音頻、或個人/小組網頁等來進行。
goals: To help students rehearse skills in various modes of writing
Help students build a good sense of the difference between smart, sophisticated, quality writing and bland, hackneyed writing
Students are expected to integrate writing techniques with their knowledge of the topic/subject
syllabus:
**Course description** 

The goal of this course is to help students think and write critically about contemporary social issues such as media violence and affirmative action. Through discussions of selected works, writing assignments, and constructive editorial reviews, the course provides the practice students need in honing essential critical reading and writing skills.

**Required text**

A course reader compiled by the instructor 

**Course requirements**

     --Three essays (D/R) + Commentary (50%)

     --Two quizzes (25%)

     --Attendance and participation (25%)
